text: is one of the 23 special wards of Tokyo, Japan.Tokyo Metropolitan Government (TMG), "Municipalities within Tokyo" . Retrieved 2012-3-27. The municipality calls itself "Suginami City" in English.Suginami City . Retrieved 2012-3-27. ==Geography== Suginami is in the western part of Tokyo's special wards. It is next to Setagaya to the south. It's western neighbors are the cities of Mitaka and Musashino. Nerima is on the northern border. Nakano is to the east. The Kanda river runs through the ward. ==Related pages == * List of special wards of Tokyo * Capital of Japan ==References== ==Other websites== * http://www2.city.suginami.tokyo.jp/life/english.htm , http://www2.city.suginami.tokyo.jp/life/japan.htm * Tokyo Metropolitan Government, Special wards * Suginami Animation Museum Category:Wards of Tokyo Category:Settlements in Tokyo Prefecture
title: Suginami
